# Air Force Exemplary Civilian Service Award

The Air Force Exemplary Civilian Service Award is an award of the Department of the Air Force that recognizes a single person or group of people for significant outstanding service in support of the mission of their command over the period of one year or in a single action.
Eligibility
Any Department of the Air Force individual or group of civilian employees who have successfully completed significant mission related projects or major milestones for their command. Their action must demonstrate how the employee exceeded service expectation for that mission.
Description
According to the Department of the Air Force Civilian Recognition Program, the medal is bronze-colored with the Department of the Air Force coat of arms inside a wreath of laurel leaves. The ribbon is green with three thin red stripes in the middle, bordered by light blue and white stripes.
